idea-plugin.name: EasyPersist
idea-plugin.description:
A plug-in to generate entity persistor codes.
Use JPA annotation to specify entity mapping information.
Use JdbcTemplate to operate on databases.
Not have much time to maintain, so do not accept feature request.
